languages.text: "Я видела тот аппарат, в который ты была заключена. Но я даже не подозревала..."
"I saw the machine you were imprisoned in, but I had no idea..."
languages.original_text: "Я видела тот аппарат, в который ты была заключена. Но я даже не подозревала..."

languages.text: “我见过当时囚禁着你的机器，但我不知道……”
languages.original_text: "I saw the machine you were imprisoned in, but I had no idea..."

traits.locale_text: “我见过当时囚禁着你的机器，但我不知道……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai vu dans quelle machine vous aviez été emprisonnée... Jamais je ne me serais doutée... »
languages.original_text: "I saw the machine you were imprisoned in, but I had no idea..."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vu dans quelle machine vous aviez été emprisonnée... Jamais je ne me serais doutée... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Vi la máquina que te encerraba, pero no tenía ni idea de...».
languages.original_text: "I saw the machine you were imprisoned in, but I had no idea..."

traits.locale_text: «Vi la máquina que te encerraba, pero no tenía ni idea de...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたが囚われていた機械を見たけど、想像を超える物だったわ…」
languages.original_text: "I saw the machine you were imprisoned in, but I had no idea..."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが囚われていた機械を見たけど、想像を超える物だったわ…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe die Maschine gesehen, in der Ihr gefangen wart, doch ich habe keinen Schimmer ..."
languages.original_text: "I saw the machine you were imprisoned in, but I had no idea..."

languages.original_text: "I saw the machine you were imprisoned in, but I had no idea..."

languages.text: "İçine tıkıldığın makineyi gördüm ama hiç bilemedim..."

traits.locale_text: "İçine tıkıldığın makineyi gördüm ama hiç haberim yoktu..."
